actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit actions under certain antitrust laws against associations engaged in the export trade unless the Federal Trade Commission has given such associations a reasonable opportunity to readjust their business to comply with applicable law.

summary.text: Prohibits specified actions under the Sherman and Clayton Antitrust Acts against associations engaged in the export trade unless the Federal Trade Commission has given such associations a reasonable opportunity to readjust their business to comply with applicable law.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit actions under certain antitrust laws against associations engaged in the export trade unless the Federal Trade Commission has given such associations a reasonable opportunity to readjust their business to comply with applicable law.
